entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early in the evening then becoming west 20 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
